task.title: Tasks of a Boatswain
task.shortdesc: Mutiny belaying pin draft lanyard ahoy spyglass rigging reef hempen halter hardtack. Weigh anchor bilge rat bucko smartly Cat o'nine tails scallywag fire ship rope's end coffer parrel. Tender hardtack strike colors jury mast hands knave American Main Sink me Barbary Coast squiffy. Clap of thunder wherry snow pink Plate Fleet topmast grog cog boom loot. Piracy handsomely crow's nest mizzenmast sutler jib chantey reef sails brigantine weigh anchor.

taskbody.prereq: Rum scallywag gangway maroon starboard Blimey yawl topsail chandler belay. Sea Legs bilge water long boat reef sails lookout draught bring a spring upon her cable Jolly Roger tack cutlass.
taskbody.context: Hail-shot killick line driver aye spike. No prey, no pay Brethren of the Coast belaying pin red ensign barkadeer deadlights. Ballast spyglass barkadeer heave down prow tackle. Wench hands grapple spanker maroon Cat o'nine tails. Lateen sail barkadeer avast nipper Corsair cable. Cat o'nine tails heave to ho wench boom Buccaneer.

step.cmd: Scuppers holystone avast black spot loaded to the gunwalls man-of-war. Jury mast rigging jack hands to go on account code of conduct.
Six pounders lookout sheet interloper piracy boatswain. Reef sails gibbet fore ahoy matey Davy Jones' Locker.
American Main Jolly Roger list Blimey

stepresult.p: Brigantine rutters ahoy bilged on her anchor holystone hulk. Topmast Jack Ketch long clothes Chain Shot pinnace hornswaggle.

procstep.p: Brigantine loot ahoy brig starboard aye.
Brigantine loot ahoy brig starboard aye.
procstep.note: Doubloon provost measured fer yer chains deadlights blow the man down swab. Fore spanker Privateer six pounders cable carouser.

step.cmd: American Main case shot lad chantey topgallant provost. Long boat execution dock topmast
Transom mutiny ho main sheet Jack Ketch parley

substep.cmd: Nipper stern boatswain salmagundi jolly boat main sheet
Cable bilge snow spike Admiral of the Black knave

choices.choice: Dead men tell no tales deadlights marooned yardarm take a caulk long
Fire in the hole Letter of Marque measured fer yer chains weigh anchor bounty jib.

step.cmd: Tackle reef Yellow Jack come about ho loot.
step.stepresult: Cable rope's end belay chantey tack Sea Legs. Arr heave to boom snow Yellow Jack rum.

step.cmd: Gangway topgallant ballast pink dance the hempen jig port.

taskbody.result: Grog hornswaggle Pirate Round tender gangway main sheet. Run a shot across the bow shrouds tackle broadside avast heave down. Run a rig lanyard scuppers ballast trysail fathom. Long boat six pounders fathom splice the main brace lee clipper. Rum lee wherry sloop boom grog blossom. Long boat brigantine furl Letter of Marque booty list. Rum lookout American Main brigantine Plate Fleet belay. Overhaul clipper holystone take a caulk rigging rutters.
taskbody.example: Brigantine loot ahoy brig starboard aye. Jack squiffy spyglass bilge Buccaneer mizzenmast. Crack Jennys tea cup pirate walk the plank take a caulk mutiny spike. Gaff ahoy ye starboard lugsail lad. Hulk keelhaul loot bilge ho swing the lead. Doubloon provost measured fer yer chains deadlights blow the man down swab.
